text: Yisakale sbirka karaiche atisighrae sihamte ka’ba, ‘allahe yadi iccha karailehemtena tente ami arau amara purbapurausasakale sbirka nakarailohemtena arau ekorae'i haraama nakarailohemtena’. E'idarae sihamtara purbarartisakale'o mithyaraopa karaichila, arasesata sihamte amara sasti bhoga karaichila. Koraa, ‘amara ocarata prakasa karaibalai tomalokara ocarata kono jnana achene? Tomaloke kerala dharanarahe anusarana karaa arau kerala manesaja katha koraa’
